name: MushLike
description:
made for the #7drl game jam! I made this up during my free nights after work over the course of a week. 

Supports controller input! only tested with a ps4 controller mapped as an xbox controller, so use at your own risk. controls are displayed on the title screen

=======================

Looks like this little bat found a mysterious cave full of mushrooms. No big deal, they LOVE mushrooms, and just so happen to be looking for a particularly rare one indeed. But it's not as safe as one would assume. Delve down into the cave and see if you can't help our little friend get closer to their goal. 

(due to the limited time frame of the game jam, only 5 likely-unbalanced floors are available)
